Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. We believe it offers immense value, especially considering its worth to you at $15000. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $12000. We are confident that this price reflects both the quality of the product and provides you with an attractive opportunity. We look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
